title: Shirley: A sex comedy
description: Graphic novelON Cover "Suggested for adult readers"Shirley is young, smart, good looking, and has a great sense of humor. So how come her lovers find her humor a bit too extreme for them?The story of Shirley is derived from our own lives and experiences with the opposite sex... What some people see as healthy enjoyable humor others find as repellent, embarrassing or just plain rude. Many people are so tight assed about sex... Will they ever learn to relax?Shirley is a sex-comedy, but it isn't simple porn. It also deals with relationship issues, expectations we have from our partners, different frames of mind...It's written by a girl (Noa) and drawn by a guy (Amitai), so it should provide a diversified view point on these subjects...
author: Noa Abarbanel
